---
title: "About"
author: "Paul Schrimpf"
---

This is the website for ECON 626: Econometric Theory I at UBC
in 2022. The course aims to equip students with introductory knowledge
in probability, statistics, and econometrics so that students become
familiar with basic concepts underlying empirical and methodological
research in economics.

This site was created using [Quarto](https://quarto.org/docs/websites).

Source code is available [on github](https://github.com/ubcecon/626)
with a [CC-by-SA license](https://github.com/ubcecon/626/blob/main/LICENSE).
